plot: When Jamie skips out on his job duties, Lamar feels he has no choice but to fire him from running his Rich Soil clothing line. Lamar wants Jamie to focus on himself, but instead Jamie starts to spiral out of control. Can Lamar help his friend get back on track before he hits rock bottom? Meanwhile, Malika realizes that she has stronger feelings for Rob than she thought after she gets upset with him for hooking up with another girl. Can she get Rob to commit to something more--or will it end up ruining their relationship?—Guilherme O.
